attributes.action: Have Newcastle Brown Ale only produced on Tyneside
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: save 63 jobs on tyneside, and refuse to allow scottish and newcastle brewery from transfering production of newcastle brown ale to tadcaster in north yorkshire

reasons: Commercial endorsement, promotion of any product, service or publication, or statements that amount to adverts
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
